languages.text: When this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Test{/g} with a −35 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −35 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Получив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} этим оружием, цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со штрафом −35 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: 此武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−35{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Test{/g} with a −35 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此武器{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−35{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が35の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しない限り、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態となる。

languages.text: Si esta arma {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} en el objetivo, este debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −35 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si esta arma {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} en el objetivo, este debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −35 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn diese Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −35 bestehen, da es ansonsten für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} wird.

traits.locale_text: Wenn diese Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −35 bestehen, da es ansonsten für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} wird.

languages.text: Lorsque qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} est porté à l'aide de cette arme, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -35, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} est porté à l'aide de cette arme, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -35, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
